content:
You're heading back to Hawaii! That's awesome! Waikiki is a great spot to catch some waves, and I'd be happy to recommend some surf schools for you.

Considering you have some experience, a refresher course will definitely help you brush up on your skills and get you back in the groove. Here are a few surf schools in Waikiki that are highly rated and offer lessons for all skill levels:

1. **Goofy Foot Surf School**: Located right on Waikiki Beach, Goofy Foot offers private and group lessons for all skill levels. They have experienced instructors who'll help you improve your technique and provide feedback to take your surfing to the next level.
2. **Faith Surf School**: Faith Surf has been operating in Waikiki for over 15 years and has a team of CPR-certified instructors. They offer private, semi-private, and group lessons, as well as surf camps and clinics. They also rent boards and provide beach amenities.
3. **Hans Hedemann Surf School**: Hans Hedemann is a legendary surfer and his school has been teaching people to surf in Waikiki for over 20 years. They offer private and group lessons, as well as surf camps and clinics. They also have a surf shop on site where you can rent boards and gear.
4. **Surf N Sea**: Surf N Sea is a local favorite that offers surf lessons, paddleboard rentals, and snorkeling gear. They have a team of experienced instructors who'll help you improve your surfing skills and provide guidance on the best breaks in the area.
5. **Aloha Beach Services**: Aloha Beach Services offers surf lessons, paddleboard rentals, and beach amenities like chairs and umbrellas. They have a team of experienced instructors who'll help you catch some waves and have fun in the sun.

All of these schools have great reviews and are conveniently located in Waikiki. Be sure to check their websites, prices, and schedules to find the one that fits your needs.

It's great to hear you've been to Hawaii before and had a chance to try surfing! The USS Arizona Memorial is a powerful experience, and I'm sure your parents appreciated the visit. This time, it's all about catching some waves and soaking up the sun in Waikiki!

Have a fantastic trip, and I hope you score some epic waves!
